website_summaries.verdict: Just like any other icon, the Puma Suede has undergone another rework to cater a broader range of consumers. The brand leveled up the classic suede silhouette (figuratively and literally) by inserting a gold toebox and platform rubber midsole to boost the style.This sport-inspired swagger with premium detailing is such a neck-breaker with utmost comfort and durability. While some complained about the sizing and the color inconsistencies, many still recommended this as a must-have for ladies who want to look trendy without hurting their pockets.
pros: Most of the reviewers liked the gold toebox detail of the Puma Suede Platform Gold
Many of them shared that this pair delivers a comfortable ride
The majority of the users noted the fun, stylish, and chic design of this sneaker
Some commended the superb craftsmanship of the Puma Suede Platform Gold
Few ladies liked that this shoe is easy to style
Several liked that this pair adds few inches to their heights
Most of them highly recommended this pair to their friends
Few users disclosed the reliable durability of this kick
Found at a wallet-friendly price point
cons: Few users felt disappointed about the gold toebox that easily creases
Several complained that this sneaker runs tad big
Grabbing a half size down is their recommendation
A couple of wearers criticized that this pair is a bit heavy
A couple of reviewers did not like that this shoe made their feet look big
Some revealed that there is a disparity in the colorways presented online and in the actual
A handful of users admitted that this pair easily gets dirty and hard to maintain

customer_reviews.title: Love these shoes
customer_reviews.text: Comfortable shoes and look very cool. True to size and sole is flexible unlike some other thick sole shoes. Go with anything whether casual or a bit dressy due to the gold toe.
customer_reviews.author: KB

customer_reviews.title: My first Puma's 😍😍😒
customer_reviews.text: I was very pleasantly surprised by how much I actually LOVE these shoes! I have a wide foot and they fit perfectly which I wasn't expecting but decided to take a chance on anyway. I'm pretty short, 5'4", and these give me just enough height. They are stylish and funky! I got the black & gold. This is a high quality shoe! Love them and will be buying more from Puma.
customer_reviews.author: Candidly Cristal

customer_reviews.title: ... a half size smaller and I must say I LOVE THESE SHOES
customer_reviews.text: I bought a half size smaller and I must say I LOVE THESE SHOES!! They are comfortable for a normally size 10 FLAT FOOTED person. It's not narrow and very impressible in person. Want to buy the black color.
customer_reviews.author: Ty Ness

customer_reviews.title: Runs big
customer_reviews.text: These are awesome Pumas, but the gold toe is flimsy and cheap. I can already tell will crinkle easily after a few good wears. They run big. I wear a 7-1/2, but need a 7. I'm returning them to spend the few extra bucks on the Adidas All Stars with gold toe.

product_meta.title: PUMA Women's Suede Platform Gold Fashion Sneaker
product_meta.description: PUMA updates the most iconic and recognizable of its style; inspired by the PUMA suede classic and the grunge era fashion from the 70s, the suede platform core keeps the original suede tooling: this style is made with the suede upper and the same outsole design as the suede classic, whereas the midsole is following the current trend of the creeper with the same height. The plus of this style is the adornment with a golden toe to add a high-fashion spin to any outfit.
